oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Kentucky volunteer military discharge and photograph
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Military discharge for Corporal George W. Henderson, Company E, 17th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment. A copy of a photograph of Henderson is attached to the top left corner of the certificate. Henderson, born in Christian County, Kentucky, enrolled in the military on November 8, 1861 for a "period of three years or the duration of the war." He was a farmer at the time of enlistment.
